settings.content_space:
Kick Sugar
to the curb
PROLON CAN HELP YOU KICK THE EXCESS SUGAR HABIT.
A survey of ProLoners found that most report that they are better able to resist sugary foods, and control their meal portions upon completion of ProLon for the first time.
Try ProLon now

settings.title: Americans can’t seem to get enough sugar.
settings.details: On average, we consume 17 teaspoons of added sugar (that’s about 80 small jelly beans!) each day, according to the CDC. And then, we crash.

settings.name: Cut Those Sugar Cravings
settings.study: By: Cynthia Sass, MPH, MA, RD, CSSD
settings.details: Beyond the rollercoaster of sugar highs and lows, consuming too much sugar has been linked to a host of health problems. From increased risk of heart disease (the leading cause of death for men and women) to links to type 2 diabetes and higher risks of cancer, sugar is, simply put, the enemy. It can also adversely affect your psychological health.

settings.pretitle: But how do you kick this sweetest of unhealthy habits?
settings.sdetails:
For starters, our 5-day program contains well under the AHA recommended daily limits of sugar*, which allows you to wean yourself off the stuff.

And after the fast, the reset continues: a survey of users found that most say that they’re better able to resist sugary foods. After just one round, users also report feeling more in control of their health and have a greater desire to take on a healthier lifestyle.
settings.lathead: Instantly curb those sugar cravings and slash your daily intake, and transition to a healthier eating pattern that sustains!TRY PROLON NOW

settings.title: WOMEN: limit added sugar consumption to six teaspoons (24g) per day, maximum
MEN: limit added sugar consumption to nine teaspoons (36g) per day, maximum
American Heart Association (AHA) Recommends
settings.stitle: How to Translate a Nutrition Facts Label:

settings.mdesc: I discovered ProLon last January and I have been doing it consistently ever since then. It is a really great reset for your body, especially after holidays. It has so many different benefits, it curbs sugar cravings and helps me manage portion control.
settings.author: - WHITNEY

settings.mdesc: Not only can I stick to ProLon when I can’t stick to other diets, it helps jumpstart into whatever diet that I am planning to do after. Prolon motivates me... it just works for me.
settings.author: -KIMBERLY

settings.mtitle: I loved it... my wife loved it!
settings.mdesc: I think this program is actually a perfect example of practicing self-discipline. Anyone that wants to get batter in that aspect of their lives, while improving overall physical health, I think ProLon is a great opportunity to do just that.
settings.author: -DAVID

settings.mdesc: How are you going to feel after 5 days... Amazing! No belly bloat, you are going to lose weight, have more energy, and all your cravings for sugar... GONE! You have to give this a try.
settings.author: -AUDREY

settings.title: You may not realize it but you’re already fasting.
settings.details: Every night when you go to sleep, your body goes into a fasting state. The human body was designed to fast but modern life intervened. Tap into your natural instincts with ProLon.
